name: Jeremy's Adventures (Combined Game)
description:
Story

Play as Jeremy who is experimenting a multi-dimensional teleporter. Go through  a white window to go to different dimensions and finish each level to find the next window and enter a new world!

Development

Each level of this 'combined' game is made by Combination Jam 2021 participants:

  • Level 1: Jeremy's Adventures (by IEP_Esy)
  • Level 2: Jeremy and the giant maze (by Golden Steel)
  • Level 3: Further Heights (by Nathan R.)
  • Level 4: Jeremy's Return (by IEP_Esy)

During Combination Jam 2021, participants created one level of a game in which had Jeremy as their main character.

After the game jam, their levels was combined together in Combination Jam Launcher; which launches each level one by one, keeps track of game progress, player's best times and includes links to each creator itch page and level pages.
